samples.context: Plant body is differentiated into stem and leaf-like structure. Vascular system is absent, which means there is no specialized tissue for transportation of water, minerals, and food. Bryophytes are also known as the amphibians of the plant kingdom because they need water to complete a part of their life cycle.
